title: The Best of The Herd
itunes:title: The Best of The Herd
description:
Welcome into the Best Of Herd Podcast with Colin Cowherd! Colin compares Packers QB Aaron Rodgers to a modern-day submarine, avoiding any bad teams if he were to leave Green Bay next year. Russell Westbrook continues to let down LeBron James but he's being put into situations he can't succeed in. Lamar Jackson limping at recent practice shows that quarterbacks need to be big and play in the pocket to survive along time in this league. Plus, we should never make athletes or celebrities into our role models when it all starts at home! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
